user.description: Enhanced and standard are short range loops. Standard has a white background. Enhanced has a topo background and configurable loop length. Mosaic is for regions or whole US.
user.title: NWS radar. Choose style of radar

standard_enhanced.description: Use https://radar.weather.gov/ to find a nearby station. https://www.weather.gov/iwx/wsr_88d#diff explains some of the radar image types
standard_enhanced.title: Configure NWS Radar

mosaic.description: Choose station. There is no choice of radar type for Mosaic images.
mosaic.title: Configure NWS Radar
